QuestData.Title: Clearing the Depths
QuestData.Description: You are a sight for sore eyes, $n. Now that we have claimed tol barad, the battle has just begun.$B$BWe discovered a cell block just east of here that we need you to clear out. Turns out that its chock full of ghosts that have been locked up down there for who knows how long.$b$bClear out as much as you can and report back to me when you are done.
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been asked to kill 9 ghosts of any type in the Cursed Depths, just east of Baradin Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: You made it back out alive? You are a stronger man than I, $n.
